summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of SalesGenius AI Sales Assistant platform completed. All core functionality working correctly with 100% backend API success rate and full frontend flow integration.

design_issues.issue: Chart components showing width/height -1 warnings in console
design_issues.description: ResponsiveContainer showing size calculation warnings, but charts still render properly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing sections
User registration flow with email/password/company validation
Dashboard loads with analytics cards and widget key display
Knowledge Base page navigation and add URL/PDF buttons
Widget Config page with bot name updates and save functionality
Settings page with account info display
All backend API endpoints (19/19 tests passed)
Authentication APIs (login, register, get user info)
